name: OptimizeSubmarine
description:
This game is a submission for  "Coding Blocks Game Jam 22"
with the theme "It’s following me"
It was created by a team of 3 programmers : 

https://mathieuroy.itch.io/

https://itch.io/profile/xavlevco20

https://mathbourque.itch.io/

In this game you control a submarine and try to collect resources while avoiding a huge monster that can instantly eat you. Buy weapons and upgrades to slow him down and outsmart him! The game is endless so try to reach the highest level possible.

Controls :
W-S : Tilt submarine verticaly
A-D  :  Activate propulsion
LeftClick : Mine Resource
Right Click : Fire Weapon
Shift : Fill submarine of water (sink)
Space: Fill submarine of air (float)
1-2 : Equip weapons
Tab: Pause game
M : full screen map
Z+ScrollWheel : resize minimap
